alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 2:28PM CDT until May 09 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rush County in central Kansas... Southeastern Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Liebenthal, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Liebenthal around 235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include La Crosse, Loretta, Bison and Otis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
